oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thursday Hikers' Trail Tales
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: compiled by Reba Haynes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Short narratives by multiple authors describing hikes taken as part of the Thursday Hikers' Trail Tales. Introduction by Reba Haynes (Mrs. Joe R. Haynes) and compiled by Mrs. Haynes. Index to authors, scans 13a and 13b. Loaned for copying by Mrs. Joe R. Haynes, Jr.;original returned to her after scanning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hiking; Great Smoky Mountains;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Haynes - Thursday Hikers' Trail Tales HPCP 2016.006
